Happenings

Inventor David Stone

We see 'Ferrock', our first Happening, as one of our greatest. David, as Material Scientist for Arizona State Univ. researching a way to use ferrite( iron ) to remove arsenic from water discovered a carbon negative replacement for cement. Making Cement generates almost 10% of world carbon and Ferrock absorbs carbon to harden making it one potential solution to the climate problem.

The Barn

We see 'The Barn' as the ultimate location for Happenings. We will, with your help, turn it into a place for concerts, dance parties as well as weddings and dinner parties.

The Work Space

If The Barn is the Ultimate, the 'The Work Space' is the Present happening space. We have held many Happenings here, including a Shitaki mushroom porpigation event and a climate friendly cement demonstration.
